name: Enhanced Edition for 5$. Should I upgrade to EE if I already own the gold edition from way back then?
author: Mrwrym

posts.author: Mrwrym
posts.content: I'm a little new to the server as I've never posted before but still love going back to NWN every so often. I'm curious about whether I should get the enhanced edition for 5$ on Steam per the summer sale, but I already own the gold edition from way back in the day on CD. What would be the reason to get the Enhanced Edition for PC, or would I just be wasting money?

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Greetings and hello MrWyrm!

EE has higher resolution, keyholing and better network server support, a lot of persistent worlds run on EE only now.

For a casual player wanting to run some of the original campaigns or old custom modules on the NWN Vault, I think the old v1.69 diamond edition would do fine. If you want to log into a persistent world i would recommend EE.

The diamond edition is the product of choice for non EE, however, gold edition - according to Wikipedia says it doesn't include HoTU. Therefore I would recommend getting this for the ability to play characters and load custom modules that require HoTU, therefore in your case it wouldn't be just a waste as you would get something extra to your gold NWN.

A little extra too...

Beamdog also has a sale at the same time. They write it also provides a steam key, however i cannot see any details of this on their site.



Might be over soon though. Hope that helps!

posts.author: Mrwrym
posts.content:
Thanks for the response Orion! I'm glad to hear that there are still servers running online for multiplayer!

I forgot to mention in the original post that I actually had the Gold edition with HOTU as a separate disc add on. So I totally have most of the content for the game (minus the other modules from platinum).

I'm thinking at this point of time (due to quarantine putting me on money saving mode) I might pass on EE for now, and keep an eye out for it in the future. I haven't played the multiplayer in quite a while and am probably far too rusty to enjoy it at my own pace. I appreciate the response and the details towards all of the new content however!

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Great, glad I could help! 
If you got Gold + HoTU then that sounds pretty close to diamond so that should be heaps of NWN content plus custom modules in the NWN vault :)
Urgh this pandemic!

posts.author: grizzled_dwarflord
posts.content: Gold isn’t quite Diamond. But both will still require thr critical rebuild. EE for $5? Seems like a no-brainer. EE requires a bit more muscle under the hood, so if you are banging around on old machine without a dedicated graphics card, then you may need to reconsider.
